src:
Klasemen Shopee Liga 1 2019: Bali United Kokoh di Puncak
07 Nov 2019, 08:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSM Makassar meraih kemenangan 2-1 atas Kalteng Putra pada Rabu (6/11/2019) sore WIB. Kemenangan itu sempat membuat PSM Makassar menggeser Persib Bandung dari peringkat kedelapan dalam klasemen Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Namun, Persib kembali ke posisinya setelah mengalahkan PSIS Semarang dengan skor 2-1 pada Rabu malam. Sementara itu, Bali United tetap kukuh di puncak klasemen setelah bermain imbang tanpa gol di kandang PSS Sleman.
Rangkaian pertandingan pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang digelar pada Rabu (6/11/2019) dimulai dengan dua laga antara PSS Sleman kontra Bali United dan PSM kontra Kalteng Putra.
PSM sukses meraih tiga poin lewat kemenangan 2-1 atas Kalteng Putra, sementara PSS dan Bali United berbagi poin setelah bermain imbang tanpa gol.
PSM memastikan tiga poin meski sempat tertinggal lebih dulu dari Kalteng Putra lewat gol Pandi Lestaluhu pada menit ke-17. Namun, gol yang dicetak Amido Balde pada menit ke-45 dan Rizky Pellu pada menit ke-66 memastikan kemenangan tim tuan rumah.
Dengan hasil dua pertandingan tersebut, PSS dan Bali United tak beranjak dari posisi masing-masing. PSS tetap berada di peringkat kelima dengan 40 poin dari 27 pertandingan, sementara Bali United kukuh di puncak klasemen dengan 56 poin dari 25 pertandingan.
Sedangkan PSM naik satu peringkat ke posisi kedelapan, menggeser Persib, dengan perolehan 36 poin dari 24 poin. Sementara Kalteng Putra tak beranjak dari posisi ke-17 dengan 23 poin dari 26 pertandingan.
Namun, Persib tak membiarkan posisinya tergeser begitu saja oleh PSM. Maung Bandung kembali menggeser PSM dari posisi kedelapan setelah meraih kemenangan 2-1 atas PSIS, dalam pertandingan yang digelar di Stadion Si Jalak Harupat, Rabu malam.
Persib membuka keunggulan lewat gol yang dicetak Ezechiel N'douassel pada menit kesembilan. Namun, Bruno Silva mencetak gol cantik yang membuat PSIS menyeimbangkan kedudukan.
Namun, upaya PSIS mencuri poin di Stadion Si Jalak Harupat kandas setelah eksekusi penalti Febri Hariyadi pada menit ke-73 berbuah gol kedua untuk Persib.
Lewat kemenangan itu Persib Bandung kini mengoleksi 37 poin dari 26 pertandingan, jumlah yang sama seperti Tira Persikabo yang berada persis di atasnya dalam klasemen Shopee Liga 1 2019.
text:
Shopee Liga 1 Standings 2019: Bali United Sturdy at the Peak
Nov 7 2019, 08:45 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSM Makassar won 2-1 victory over Kalteng Putra on Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon WIB. The victory had made PSM Makassar shift Persib Bandung from eighth in the 2019 Shopee League 1 standings.
However, Persib returned to his position after defeating PSIS Semarang with a score of 2-1 on Wednesday night. Meanwhile, Bali United remains firm at the top of the table after a goalless draw at home to Sleman's PSS.
The series of 27th Week of Shopee Liga 1 match 2019 which was held on Wednesday (6/11/2019) began with two matches between PSS Sleman against Bali United and PSM against Kalteng Putra.
PSM successfully won three points with a 2-1 victory over Kalteng Putra, while PSS and Bali United shared the points after a goalless draw.
PSM ensure three points even though it had left earlier than Kalteng Putra through Pandi Lestaluhu scored in the 17th minute. However, goals scored by Amido Balde in the 45th minute and Rizky Pellu in the 66th minute sealed the home team's victory.
With the results of these two matches, PSS and Bali United did not move from their respective positions. PSS remains in fifth place with 40 points from 27 matches, while Bali United stands firm at the top of the standings with 56 points from 25 matches.
While PSM rose one rank to eighth position, shifting Persib, with the acquisition of 36 points from 24 points. While Kalteng Putra did not move from 17th place with 23 points from 26 matches.
However, Persib did not let his position just shifted by PSM. Maung Bandung again moved PSM from eighth position after winning 2-1 over PSIS, in a match that was held at the Si Jalak Harupat Stadium on Wednesday night.
Persib opened the scoring through goals scored by Ezechiel N'douassel in the ninth minute. However, Bruno Silva scored a beautiful goal that made PSIS balance the position.
However, PSIS efforts to steal points at the Si Starling Harupat Stadium ran aground after Febri Hariyadi's penalty in the 73rd minute produced a second goal for Persib.
Through this victory Persib Bandung now has 37 points from 26 matches, the same number as Tira Persikabo who is just above it in the Shopee Liga 1 2019 standings.
